titleStmt.title: Upper Mapping and Binding Exchange Layer

info.p: UMBEL is based on OpenCyc represented in RDF format using OWL and SKOS. UMBEL provides two valuable functions: (1) it provides a vocabulary for the construction of concept-based domain ontologies, designed to act as references for the linking and mapping of external content, and (2) it is its own broad, general reference structure of 21,000 concepts, which provides a scaffolding to orient other datasets and domain vocabularies.
